long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the enchanting world of Winx Club every time you open a new tab. This Chrome live wallpaper extension brings stunning visuals, vibrant animations, and the charm of your favorite fairy characters directly to your screen. Designed for speed, safety, and seamless browsing, it offers an exceptional experience while keeping your browser secure and efficient.

Features:
🌈 Live wallpapers inspired by the magical Winx Club universe
🌐 Quick access to your favorite and most-used sites
🔍 Customizable search bar compatible with your preferred search engine
📂 Easy-to-access developer information and removal options
Step into a magical realm of beauty and creativity. Download now and make every tab an adventure! 🧚‍♀️✨
